title: Lauren Spierer // 34
description:
After a night of drinking at a sports bar in Summer 2011, a 20-year-old Indiana University student is seen stumbling home with a male acquaintance. When her boyfriend fails to get in touch with her the following day, a nation-wide searched is conducted to find her. Tons of anonymous tips come in and the next is more confusing than the last. This is the case of Lauren Spierer.
